Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $12000 to us, reflecting its quality, innovation, and the effort put into its creation. We believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or operations. Considering its worth, we're offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $10500. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and exceptional customer support. We're confident that with its purchase, you'll enjoy its benefits for years to come. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information. We look forward to serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
